main event: Three dull orange circular objects were observed in straight and level flight over Biloxi, Mississippi, on April 13, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were reported to have traveled at high speed and changed formation rapidly,The sighting lasted for about 4-5 seconds,The sighting was made by an AF officer at Keesler AFB with significant visibility conditions,There were two civilian witnesses who claimed to see the same objects,The weather conditions at the time were clear, with winds reported from the northwest.
witness description: An AF officer and a civilian witness along with others in the vicinity
